title: Public opinion on adoption rights for same-sex couples in the U.S. 2014
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Yes should and lowest at Response No opinion.
The highest Response Yes should has 61.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response No opinion.
min_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Yes should has the highest Share of respondents and No opinion has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Yes should and lowest at Response No opinion.
The highest Response Yes should has 61.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response No opinion.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 63.0 is found at Response Yes should and the minimum is found at No opinion where Share of respondents is 2.0.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Response .
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 61.0.
The Response No opinion tends to be 1.89 percent lower than average.
The Share of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
